intent_atoms.description: All parser enhancements must be documented in DOCS/TASK_ARCHIVE and referenced from the main specification.
Implement a ftyp box parser that extracts major_brand, minor_version, and compatible_brands.
The ftyp box parser is completed and its summary of work is documented in DOCS/TASK_ARCHIVE/99_C1_ftyp_Box_Parser/Summary_of_Work.

functional_units.name: stsd sample description parser
functional_units.description: Parses stsd boxes and extracts codec-specific metadata such as avcC, hvcC, and encrypted variants

functional_units.name: ftyp box parser
functional_units.description: Parses ftyp boxes extracting major_brand, minor_version, and compatible_brands
